description: Try our easy to follow Iron Man Chia & Date Bites recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Snack,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Back to school,Quick & easy dessert
name: Iron Man Chia & Date Bites Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Line an 18cm square cake tin with baking paper. Process fruit & nut mix, oats and chia in a food processor until finely chopped. Add Weet-Bix, pepitas, coconut and cacao. Pulse to combine. Transfer to a bowl.
Add dates, oil, spread, honey and 1 tbs boiling water to processor. Process until smooth.
Pour over dry ingredients and stir well until combined. Press into prepared pan and chill for 1 hour. Cut into 36 bite-size pieces
